name: Data drift detector Python flex template
description: Data drift detector Python flex template.

parameters.name: request_response_log_table
parameters.label: Request response log table.
parameters.helpText: A full name of the BQ request-response log table

parameters.name: feature_names
parameters.label: Feature names.
parameters.helpText: A list of feature names for instances in simple list format.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.label: Start time.
parameters.helpText: A time window start time in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.label: End time.
parameters.helpText: A time window end time in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

parameters.name: output_path
parameters.label: Output path.
parameters.helpText: The output path for stats and anomalies protobufs.

parameters.name: schema_file
parameters.label: Schema file.
parameters.helpText: A GCS path to schema file.

parameters.name: baseline_stats_file
parameters.label: Baseline stats file.
parameters.helpText: A GCS path to a baseline statistics file.
